thread.title: LittleBigPlanet 3 celebrates Back to the Future Day with new DLC
thread.title_full: LittleBigPlanet 3 celebrates Back to the Future Day with new DLC

title: LittleBigPlanet 3 celebrates Back to the Future Day with new DLC
text: Wednesday, Oct 21 2015, 20:30 BST Share on Facebook Share on Twitter Share on Google+ LittleBigPlanet 3 is celebrating Back to the Future Day with a new set of downloadable content.Available now, the 'Back to the Future Level Kit' consists of a new gameplay level in which Sackboy joins Marty and Doc in 1955 for a journey across Hill Valley.The DLC also includes a new power-up, the Hoverboard, which helps riders race against time by speeding across each time period of Hill Valley.New Back to the Future -inspired costumes are featured as well, based on Marty McFly's 2015 clothing, Doc Brown's 2015 clothing and Biff Tannen's 1955 clothing.Some other notables include two new music tracks, a sound object, a new background, 18 new materials, four objects, 27 decorations and 127 stickers - all of which can be used to invent your own Back to the Future -themed creations. Grand Theft Auto 5 is another game that recently got involved in the Back to the Future Day fun .Take an in-numbers look at the Back to the Future trilogy in just 88 seconds below:Check out our most anticipated games of October, one of many videos in Digital Spy 's dedicated Gaming YouTube channel. Be sure to subscribe!
